channel.title: Need Help. Error message
channel.description:
Need someone to tell me what i have done wrong. Basically this is the error message it comes up with when i try to spec an npc.
[code=text][2/26/11 5:33 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 338 [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2036) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:169) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickNPC.processPacket(C lickNPC.java:99) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1417) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [2/26/11 5:33 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165)[/code]
